item.title: Evaluate Intensive Care Needs with ML
item.description: Machine learning (ML) can be applied in hospital to improve health care quality. This is a demonstration of steps to build ML models to evaluate the need for intensive care within the first 24 hours of admission. The post includes the workflow from data cleansing, feature engineering and model building that can be direcly applied in real-world settings.
